InRetail Peru Corp Acquisition Of Makro Supermayorista SA M&A Call
Lima Dec 29, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of InRetail Peru Corp M&A conference call or presentation Monday, December 28, 2020 at 1:00:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
